question: Show names of employees with salary above 60000
sql: SELECT name FROM employees WHERE salary > 60000;

question: Get names and salaries of employees in Engineering
sql: SELECT name, salary FROM employees WHERE dept_id=3;

question: Show each employee's name and their project name
sql: SELECT e.name, p.proj_name FROM employees e JOIN projects p ON e.emp_id = p.emp_id;
